name: Golden Pirate ErniePaiwt Founder's Token
description: After being forced to "Walk The Plank", Enjin Ernest, "Paiwt Hand", commonly known as "Ernie", taking on the role of a Pirate, is now recovering his buried treasures.

properties.Tournament Ability: "Walk The Plank"- Place all current cards in your hand face up onto the discard pile, then draw an equal amount of cards from the face down draw pile.
properties.Treasures: Paiwt Airdrops and 10% Off All Paiwt Orders
